activities: CP Document Technologies is a full service litigation support provider.  Our services include data collection, processing, filtering, culling, de-duplication, and hosting of both electronically stored information and paper documents which may be converted to electronic, or image, format.  Personal Information may be collected in the EU by CP Document Technologies or by its client or others at the client’s and/or legal counsel’s direction.  Personal Information from the EU may be sent to CP Document Technologies’ United States facilities by the client or by CP Document Technologies or others at the client’s and/or legal counsel’s direction.
